lyrics: My heart belongs to you, I'll risk it all for you... Blinding lights, no I can't sleep until I feel your touch.
I'm a starboy, look what you've done... I'm tryna put you in the worst mood, ah.
Never need a bitch, I'm what a bitch need... Low life for life 'cause I'm heartless.
I saw you dancing in a crowded room, you look so happy when I'm not with you.
I'm running out of time, 'cause I can see the sun light up the sky... I'm just tryna get by.
I only call you when it's half past five... The hills have eyes, the hills have eyes.
We found each other, I helped you out of a broken place... I almost cut a piece of myself for your life.
Even though we're going through it... And it's bringing me down, I'd die for you.
And I know she'll be the death of me, at least we'll both be numb... You just gotta trust me.
All along, I've been comin' for ya... And you want me to save you.
You know how I like it when you tell me what I'm doing wrong... I can see the pain in your eyes.
You don't know what's in store, but you know what it is... Let me take the night, I love real easy.
That's that loft music... Make that money, make that money.
Don't you cry tonight, don't you cry... You know how to keep me without making me want you.
I hope you can handle me, the way that you do... You're so fine, you're so fine.
I said you're a slave to my body... Can you take it? Can you take it?
If you love me right, we f*ck for life... On the floor, and now the bed.
When the lights shut off and the dark comes through... You're the only one I think of.
If you knew how much I really liked you... I'd rather this than be with someone else.
She told me, 'If I leave tonight, can we still pretend we're in love?'... Her eyes were closed.
I only call you when it's half past five... The sun's gonna rise.
Valerie, I know it's been a long time... I don't even care.
I trip, I fall, I break, I make mistakes... It's my fault.
She said, 'It's cold, does that matter?'... Loft music.
If you're looking for love, know that love don't live here... I'm just looking for the nightlife.
You know how to keep me waiting... I'm in your city.
We talk in the dark, 'cause we know it's the only way to remember each other's names... Gasoline.
I can't stay the same, I keep losing my brain... Take my breath away.
The last few months, I've been working on me, baby... Out of time.
The night is young, here I come... It's a tale.
I was born in a city where we learned to play... Sacrifice.
I'm feeling less than zero... I'm running out of time.
Lost in the city, no way out... A life in the city.
I feel it coming, I feel it coming... Babe, when all the rage comes.
I'm good, I'm good, I'm great... Party monster.
She loves everybody, can't you tell by the signs?... False alarm.
Every time we try to forget who I am... I'll be right there.
I think I'm in love with you... Rockin' the boat.
He said to be cool but I'm already coolest... Sidewalks.
I can't stay here, I need some space... Six summers.
Kiss land, welcome to kiss land... It's a different city.
Love in the sky, love in the sky... We're flying.
Pretty, pretty, pretty... You're so pretty.
All I know is that you're somebody... All I know.
A lonely night, I need someone... A lonely night.
True colors, show me your true colors... I see you.
Sky walker, high in the sky... Walker.
Ordinary life, but I want more... Ordinary.
Nothing without you, nothing... I need you.
